answerList: When both of Thymio's ground sensors detect nothing, Thymio's bottom and top LEDs will become green. When the ground sensors detect something, the LEDs will turn off.
When Thymio's ground sensors detect something, Thymio's bottom LEDs will become green. When the ground sensors detect nothing, the LEDs will turn off.
When Thymio's ground sensors detect something, Thymio's top LEDs will become green. When the ground sensors detect nothing, the LEDs will turn off.
When both of Thymio's ground sensors detect something, Thymio's bottom and top LEDs will become green. When the ground sensors detect nothing, the LEDs will turn off.
When both of Thymio's ground sensors detect something, Thymio's bottom and top LEDs will become green. When the ground sensors detect nothing, the bottom LEDs will turn off.
